item.title: Custom compliance implementation in AWS CDK
item.description:
AWS CDK accelerates cloud development using common programming languages to model your applications. I had a series of posts using CDK to demonstrate Building serverless web applications with AWS Serverless. Because CDK uses a programming language to model your application, you can encapsulate your library via Constructs, and then reuse it crossing the entire application. Meanwhile, you can create your own constructs to encapsulate the compliance requirements to simplify the code.
